title: Edward II, Christopher Marlowe, Teatr Nowy, Warszawa
description: White poster with crudely-drawn hand near center, with index finger pointing up and to right. In top right corner, text reads: "EDWARD II"  and "Christopher Marlowe" in black. Across bottom, text reads: "TEATR NOWY/ Warszawa" in black.
